knxUltimateHueCameraMotion.heading: Hue Camera Motion node
knxUltimateHueCameraMotion.output_info: No KNX gateway selected. When the Node-RED output pin is enabled, Hue camera motion events are still emitted to your flow.
knxUltimateHueCameraMotion.motion_info: Link your KNX motion group address to receive the detected/not detected state.
